name: Strawberry Fields High School
description: Strawberry Fields High School, Chandigarhs mobile app is a smart tool, a complete and comprehensive package which brings all e-Care facilities at one place at fingertips for all users (School management, Teachers, Parents). Responding to the growing use of mobile technology in the modern world and the increased adoption of smart phones, SFHS has extended its multi-platform capabilities to include support for tablets and smart phones. SFHS now enables user to carry their school world in their pocket with this mobile application. Its fast to set up and simple to use.
